_comment: This is a template file. Copy this to conferences.json and configure your settings.
_setup_instructions: 2. Replace placeholder values with your actual configuration
3. Set the password environment variable in .env.local
4. Adjust sheet column mappings to match your Google Spreadsheet structure

_google_spreadsheet_setup._note: Your Google Spreadsheet should have the following structure
required_columns: Column A (0): ID - Unique identifier for each attendee
Column D (3): Name - Attendee's full name
Column K (10): CheckedIn - Boolean or status field
Column M (12): StaffName - Staff who performed check-in
optional_columns: Column B (1): Attribute - Attendee type (Speaker, Sponsor, etc.)
Column C (2): Affiliation - Company or organization
Column E (4): NameKana - Name in kana (Japanese)
Column F (5): Items - Items to hand out
Column G (6): BodySize - T-shirt or merchandise size
Column H (7): Novelties - Additional novelty items
Column J (9): AttendsReception - Reception attendance flag

_column_mapping_guide._note: Column indices are zero-based (A=0, B=1, C=2, ...)
_column_mapping_guide.example: If your 'Name' column is in column E, set 'name': 4
